page.title: 18CLUBS
page.content: After school, many of us go to clubs or organisations on certain nights of the week. Several boys go to Cubs. They wear special green jerseys and green caps. They play games and learn First Aid and do work to get proficiency badges. Just recently some of the Cubs went to camp and had to cook their own food! Many girls are Brownies. They wear a brown dress with a yellow tie and a brown hat. They also work for badges and play games. Every year they have a pack holiday. Some of the girls go to dancing lessons. They learn tap, modern and ballet dancing. They wear a leotard and tights. They work for special exams and each year they put on a show for parents and friends.Other children go to swimming clubs, ice-skating or to learn to play musical instruments.
